body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to us today. My name is Austin Davis and I'm with BrightLight Hotels. May I ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joyce. Could you please spell out your last name for me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce. Can you provide me with your date of birth but say it as individual digits?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's zero five slash one zero slash one nine seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce. One more detail, could you confirm the last four digits of your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Joyce. Your privacy is important to us. Is there anything specific that's making you feel nervous?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm concerned about how my personal information is being handled by the hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern, Joyce. We take privacy seriously and I assure you that your information is secure with us. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time, Joyce. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, you have been very helpful. Have a great day too!
